mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG_REPLY VALUES(REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{blog_no}, #{user_id}, #{reply_content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, BLOG_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_ID, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM BLOG_REPLY JOIN E_USER USING(USER_ID) WHERE BLOG_NO = #{blog_no} ORDER BY REPLY_NO
